author: NBCNews.com
title: Can people be reinfected with coronavirus?
description: British researchers say a study of 96 COVID-19 patients found their antibodies peaked after three weeks after the symptoms appeared, then rapidly declined. Three months later, only 17 percent of those tested had the same level of antibodies.
source.name: NBC News
